kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//button[@aria-label='Do not consent']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
Opens a new browser and navigates to the base URL

test.name: Search Given Book And Buy It

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//a[normalize-space()='My Account']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Type Text
kw.msg: Types the text 'testaaja@test.com' in the given field.
kw.doc: Types the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Type Text
kw.msg: Types the text 'Testaaja123*' in the given field.
kw.doc: Types the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//input[@name='login']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector //a[normalize-space()='Logout'] at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Search For Book
Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//a[normalize-space()='Shop']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Type Text
kw.msg: Types the text 'Android Quick Start Guide' in the given field.
kw.doc: Types the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Types the given key combination into element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//h2[@class="post-title entry-title"]/a[normalize-space(text())="Android Quick Start Guide"]'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
Searches for a given book by name

kw.name: Add Products To Basket
Get Elements
kw.msg: Found locator('text=Add to basket').first() Locators successfully.
${buttons} = ['text=Add to basket >> nth=0']
kw.doc: Returns a reference to Playwright [https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-locator|Locator] for all matched elements by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element 'text=Add to basket >> nth=0'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//a[@title='View your shopping cart']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
Adds all products to the shopping basket

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//a[normalize-space()='Proceed to Checkout']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Place Order And Verify Order Received
Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//input[@id='place_order']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector //p[@class='woocommerce-thankyou-order-received'] at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
Places the order and verifies that the order was received

test.doc: Tests to search for a given book and buy it
